Posts.Content: I have seen both natural hair brows on lace, and paint-on with stencils. Which are preferred by our community? I am pre-chemo, and want to get set up. Thanks!
Posts.Title: Eyebrow "replacement"?

Posts.Content: On 12/27/2007 denny1 wrote: Is there a law suit for Premarin only patients? I took Premarin for 14 years, was DX with infiltrated lobular carcinoma 4cm, ER+, PR+ and HER2+, I had genetic testing and do not have the gene for breast cancer. I had bilateral masectomy/reconstruction, and chemotherapy. I am on Tamoxfin now and have not known one day without severe bone pain since chemo, I feel as if I am 90 years old. It doesn't seem right that if you took Prempro you have grounds for a law suit but not if you took Premarin. I have no doubt that Premarin caused my breast cancer. Any advice would be helpful. What is the statue of limitations on this in Mississippi? DennyLast summer, I was put on Premarin. But after 3 months, the Dr. was considering changing me to oral instead of the cream. I already had a fibroid lump in my breast for some years. My Dr. did a needle biopsy, and I had developed cancer. On Jan 15, 2008, I had my right breast surgery. I believe that the Premarin changed the fibroid to cancer.
Posts.Title: Premarin Law Suit Only?
